price: 23. Kaadu kay wakliiti iyyah (malaykatti) ah yi-garil taniimiy massowte kay taamak.
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
